mapper.insert: insert into course ( lecture_no, course_no, question_no, question, file_nm, save_file_nm, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date ) values ( #{lecture_no}, #{course_no}, #{question_no}, #{question}, #{file_nm}, #{save_file_nm}, #{input_id}, now(), #{update_id}, now() )

insert into study ( lecture_no, course_no, question_no, answer, correct_yn, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date ) values ( #{lecture_no}, #{course_no}, #{question_no}, #{answer}, #{input_id}, now(), #{update_id}, now() )
mapper.update: update course set lecture_no = #{lecture_no}, course_no = #{course_no}, question = #{question}, file_nm = #{file_nm}, save_file_nm = #{save_file_nm}, open = #{open}, update_id = #{id}, update_date = now()
